DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate food factors related to colonically derived regulation of glucose metabolism (and related parameters) and satiety using a semi-acute meal study in healthy subjects as experimental model.
DOC.brief_title: Role of Colonic Events on Metabolism and Appetite Control: A Synbiotic Approach
DOC.criteria: Normal fasting blood glucose, BMI 1925 kg/m2, for women: hormon based contraceptives gastrointestinal diseases or food allergies e.g. lactose, gluten intolerance, metabolic disorders e.g. diabetes, tobacco/snuff users. Antibiotic or probiotic usage within two weeks, and during the study. Vegetarians
